text: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدۡ جَآءَكُم بُرۡهَٰنٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَأَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ نُورٗا مُّبِينٗا
translation: O people, there has come to you conclusive evidence[111] from your Lord, and We have sent down to you a clear light[112].
footnotes:
[111] i.e., Prophet Muhammad (ﷺ).
 [112] i.e., the Qur’an which guides people to the straight path as if they walk in its light.
